1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Message
6  ( -- * Message
7    expOrdSym,
8    quotNotEnd,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base       as B
12
13-- | Expect ordinary symbol
14expOrdSym :: B.Ab a
15expOrdSym = Left $ B.abortBecause "Expect ordinary symbol"
16
17-- | Quotation not end in line
18quotNotEnd :: B.Ab a
19quotNotEnd = Left $ B.abortBecause "Quotation not end in line"
20
